alert.note: Alert for Malibu Coast; Ventura County Beaches; Ventura County Inland Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 29 at 9:49AM PDT until October 30 at 10:00PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT THROUGH 10 PM MONDAY EVENING FOR GUSTY SANTA ANA WINDS AND VERY LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR MUCH OF LOS ANGELES AND VENTURA COUNTIES... .The first strong Santa Ana wind event of the season is now ongoing and behaving close to expectations with widespread wind gusts of 40 to 60 mph through the mountains valleys and some coasts within the Santa Ana wind cooridor of LA/Ventura Counties with isolated gusts near 70 mph. Single digit humidities will prevail during the day with minimal recovery at night. Winds may drop off a bit into Monday but remain on the strong side. Further weakening is expected into Tuesday, but may remain strong enough to support continued critical fire weather conditions (30-50 percent chance) away from the coast across wind prone portions of Los Angeles and Ventura counties. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PDT MONDAY FOR GUSTY SANTA ANA WINDS AND VERY LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR THE VENTURA COUNTY AND MALIBU COASTS... * Winds...Northeast 15 to 30 mph with gusts 50 mph, except gusts to 60 mph in the hills above Malibu. Strongest winds on Sunday, diminishing around 10 mph on Monday. * Relative Humidity...Minimum humidity each day 5 to 10 percent. Very poor humidity recoveries of 10 to 20 percent in wind prone areas. * Impacts...If fire ignition occurs there could be rapid spread of wildfire that would lead to a threat to life and property.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. Use extreme caution with anything that can spark a wildfire. Residents near wildland interfaces should be prepared to evacuate if a wildfire breaks out. See readyforwildfire.org and wildfirerisk.org for information.

area.areaDesc: Malibu Coast; Ventura County Beaches; Ventura County Inland Coast
